snippet: A mother and child were missing after being swept into a creek in the eastern part of the state.
abstract: Mother and child are missing after being swept into a creek in eastern Kentucky during heavy rains.
lead_paragraph: A mother and child were missing after being swept into a creek in the eastern part of the state.

headline.main: Kentucky: Flood Sweeps Away Mother and Child
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Flood Sweeps Away Mother and Child
